Articles.Content:
I THINK this is the right place to post it, if not sorry :/

Can I request a name change from Wolfblood to Kam? I made this profile three years ago and have since changed my nickname.
Yes, a mod should get to you soon. Keep in mind that once you change it, you cannot change it back, even to your old name.

Out of interest, is it software limitation or forum rule that limits name changes to once per user?

I guess forum rule.

> 
> Out of interest, is it software limitation or forum rule that limits name changes to once per user?
> I guess forum rule.

A forum rule, as I understand it. If unrestricted people would change them like user titles, and you'd never know who you were talking to. I frequent another forum where name changes are unrestricted, and it gets real confusing real fast.

Theres a forum I'm a member of that tracks username changes. Click on someone's name, and on their profile it has a list of their "Known as"... Its pretty nifty when they integrated it into their forums because name changes get confusing as heck.
